modName: Metal Gear Solid Snake Eater Boss Chest Scar for CBBE
summary: Only for CBBE. Scar on chest runs down to pelvis.
descriptionHtml:
I wanted this on my character: The Boss\' C-section battle scar. I didn\'t think i could do it.
This is for those hard core MGS fans. Works with all CBBE mods. Just a Texture replacer.

If you replace on your regular character, all of that race will have the same scar, not cool, you need to get the custom race mod http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8720 and place it in the CustomNord or CustomHighElf or wherever. Not accessible with Orc, Cats, or Lizards.

Big thanks to CBBE
Which you can get here! http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666

And works with the cool Killer Keos Skimpy Armors here! http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3654

BTW, check out MGS Snake Eater Face Paints http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12145
author: Shwangk
